data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Majka, Christopher G., Pollock, Darren A. (2006): Understanding saproxylic beetles: new records of Tetratomidae, Melandryidae, Synchroidae, and Scraptiidae from the Maritime Provinces of Canada (Coleoptera: Tenebrionoidea). Zootaxa 1248: 45-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172970
